The Apple MacBook Air M4 laptop has long hovered at $799 at Amazon — a full $200 below its Apple Store price. But it just [dropped down to $749](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZD9S5GC&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=6fff181c-d5f2-4e5f-8daf-ad7b81fb0f93&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=dropped+down+to+%24749&&signature=AQAAAdJuZUa2KyXnLASFoeh2UgPM-na_ET6d9heh_0C-xG4r&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-2025-MacBook-13-inch-Laptop%2Fdp%2FB0DZD9S5GC%2F), which is the lowest price we've seen since this model was introduced in March. This sale is for the model with 16GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage, across all four colorways, but the [512GB model is also down to $949](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZD89BFV&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=6fff181c-d5f2-4e5f-8daf-ad7b81fb0f93&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=512GB+model+is+also+down+to+%24949&&signature=AQAAAWWBpsuQvS0zpHcO4nDapGPf9yu85QKO4w56nxPdThmz&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-2025-MacBook-13-inch-Laptop%2Fdp%2FB0DZD89BFV%2F) — another all-time low versus the Apple Store price of $1,199.

We ranked this as our favorite Apple laptop in our list of the [best MacBook computers](https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/best-macbook-140032524.html). Heck, it's even our [very favorite laptop](https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/best-laptops-120008636.html). Full stop. The performance is exceptionally snappy, thanks to the M4 chip. We appreciated the upgraded battery life, which now lasts for around 18 hours per charge. That's well beyond a full day of work.

The design is lightweight, but sturdy. This has become a hallmark for modern MacBook Air computers. The screen is both gorgeous and roomy, even though it's technically just a 13-inch panel. There's support for the P3 wide color gamut and it can reach up to 500 nits of brightness.

This is a near-perfect laptop, but there are a couple of nitpicks. There's no USB-C port on the right side, limiting how users can arrange accessories on a desk. Also, the screen is capped with a 60Hz refresh rate. Another potential complication is the looming specter of the M5 chip. The company has already [released the MacBook Pro M5](https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/apple-macbook-pro-m5-14-inch-review-a-huge-graphics-upgrade-for-creators-and-gamers-170009179.html), so a new MacBook Air is likely coming in the nearish future. (Read: sometime in early 2026).

If you need more screen space, you'll find a similar discount on the [15-inch MacBook Air](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZDBWM5B&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=6fff181c-d5f2-4e5f-8daf-ad7b81fb0f93&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=15-inch+MacBook+Air&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRFpEQldNNUIvcmVmPWZzX2FfbWJ0Ml91czI_&signature=AQAAAT4QBkXdSgCE66ucPnyCTA4n_aCZa3aJYiSJ1rumh_x0&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DZDBWM5B%2Fref%3Dfs_a_mbt2_us2) on Amazon, too. Most color options are $250 off and down to $949 for the base model (you guessed it — another all-time low).
